Hi, I'm James _

( Chicago-based full-stack web developer who can design and build your next big idea )

How Can I Help You?

Develop

If you've never had a web presence or your current site is showing its age, let me create a modern static site or dynamic app to fit your business needs and grow your market.

Design

Most web traffic now comes from mobile devices, and a site which doesn't work on small screens can send customers elsewhere. I can build you a web experience which works on any device size.

Host

A website is only useful if it's online, but you've got more important things to worry about. I can set up and manage your server or shared hosting to ensure that your message is always visible.

Who Am I?

I've always had a deep curiosity for how things work, as well as a passion for solving problems using technology. These traits have led to a graduate degree in physics and coursework in computer science.

Although I'm familiar with Python, C++, and Java, my true love is JavaScript. To share my excitement for the language, I created JS for Fun!, a platform for articles and video tutorials on all aspects of being a JavaScript developer. I also write about my journey on Medium.

When not learning the latest web technologies, I'm spending time with my extremely smart and lovely wife, listening to a variety of music from the past 100 years, playing guitar, or some combination of all three.
